name: Land reclamation - Filling of wetland or inter-tidal areas to create more land - pressure layer from the WIO Symphony tool
description:
Manually collected data, provided by Begeospatial AB, were used. The collected points were separated within different coastal features. 5-km buffer zones were used for masking around land reclamation points, then rasterized into a raster and mapped onto the reference grid. Known limitations: "The manually corrected data using the sattelite images within the curtain period of time, it could miss out some exist activities within this region and contain data gaps.
"
